messages.content:
Please check text for email "Dear Irene, 

Thank you a lot for your support. 

No, nothing yet. Still waiting. 

I get back to you once there will be any updates. 

Best regards,"

Dear Irene,

Thank you so much for your support.

No, there is no news yet. We are still waiting for updates.

I will reach out to you as soon as there are any developments.

Best regards,
Please advise where you can go to visit when you will be in Nairobi (KENYA)

When visiting Nairobi, Kenya, there are several attractions and places you can explore. Here are some recommendations:

1. Nairobi National Park: This unique wildlife park is located just outside the city center, offering an opportunity to see various animals such as lions, giraffes, zebras, and rhinos, against the backdrop of the city skyline.

2. David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust: Pay a visit to this elephant orphanage to learn about their conservation efforts. You can even get up close and personal with baby elephants during their feeding times.

3. Giraffe Centre: Interact with endangered Rothschild giraffes and feed them by hand at this conservation center. You can also learn about their conservation efforts and enjoy scenic nature trails nearby.

4. Karen Blixen Museum: Step into the world of this famous Danish author at the former home of Karen Blixen, who wrote "Out of Africa". Take a guided tour to learn about her life and the history of the area.

5. Maasai Market: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of this open-air market, where you can find a variety of traditional crafts, jewelry, clothing, and souvenirs. Practice your bargaining skills here!

6. Nairobi Railway Museum: If you're interested in history and trains, this museum showcases an interesting collection of vintage locomotives and carriages. Gain insights into Kenya's railway history.

7. Kazuri Beads: Visit the Kazuri Beads workshop and learn about their fair-trade jewelry craftsmanship. You can witness the intricate process of creating beautiful ceramic beads and even purchase some unique pieces.

8. Nairobi National Museum: Explore Kenya's rich cultural heritage and history through the exhibits in this museum. It houses archaeological, ethnographic, and art collections, providing valuable insights into the country's past.

These are just a few suggestions, and Nairobi has much more to offer. Enjoy your visit to this vibrant and diverse city!

Please check this email  make it smart "Dear Colleagues, 

I am writing to bring to your attention that according to my eVisa there are no updates yet, I am checking my status every 1 hours. 

Kindly contact the immigration office to expedite the process. Otherwise,  I will need to let you know to cancel my tickets. 

Best regards,"

Dear Colleagues,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inform you that, as per my eVisa, there have been no updates regarding the application process. I have been diligently checking my status every hour, but unfortunately, there has been no progress.

I kindly request that you contact the immigration office to expedite the process. Time is of the essence, and if there is no improvement soon, I may have to inform you to cancel my tickets.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
